Title: Nyamasheke: Bubakiwe ibyumba 11 by’amashuri nk’inyungu ku mafaranga ava mu bukerarugendo
Body:
Abaturiye hafi ya Pariki ya Nyungwe mu karere ka Nyamasheke bavuga ko ibikorwa bakorerwa biva mu mafaranga y’Ubucyerarugendo bibatera imbaraga zo gukomeza kurwanya ba rushimusi.
Abaturiye hafi ya Pariki ya Nyungwe mu karere ka Nyamasheke bavuga ko ibikorwa bakorerwa biva mu mafaranga y’Ubucyerarugendo bibatera imbaraga zo gukomeza kurwanya ba rushimusi.
Ibi babigarutseho ubwo batahaga ku mugaragaro ibyumba by’amashuri 11 byubatswe n’ikigo cy’igihugu cy’iterambere RDB.
Ibyumba bitatu byubatswe ku ishuri ribanza rya Mutagatifu Paul rya Rugabe mu Murenge wa Karambi n’ ibyumba umunani byubatswe ku ishuri ribanza rya Nyarusiza riherereye mu Murenge wa Mahembe mu karere ka Nyamasheke.
Aya mashuri yose ari munsi ya Pariki ya Nyungwe. Ababyeyi barerera muri ibi bigo by’amashuri bavuga ko ibikorwa bakorerwa bibagaragariza ko pariki ari iyabo bigatuma barushaho kuyirinda abashaka kuyangiza.
Mukeshimana Zacharie ati “Byatunejeje cyane, twahise tubona akamaro ka Nyungwe twumva tugomba kuyibungabunga kuko abana bacu bigiraraga mu mashuri mabi.”
Nyirambarushimana Cecile ati“Badukoreye ibintu byiza kuko batumye abana bacu bigira ahantu heza, urumva ko tugomba kurinda pariki yacu kugira ngo amafaranga avamo akomeze yiyongere, bizatuma dukomeza kubona ibikorwa byinshi.”
Bamwe mu banyeshuri biga muri ibi bigo by’amashuri bavuga ko bigiraga mu byumba bishaje ndetse bakicara ari benshi ku ntebe ariko kuri ubu bakaba biga neza, akaba ariyo mpamvu biyemeje gukomeza kurwanya ba rushimusi.
Mugabo Aime wiga mu mwaka wa Gatandatu w’amashuri abanza yagize ati “Turishimye cyane twabaga turi abana benshi bigatuma tudatsinda kubera hari aho twicaraga turi batanu, ubu twicara turi batatu kubera amashuri mashyashya. Tumaze kandi gusobanukirwa no kubungabunga ibinyabuzima biba muri parike ya Nyungwe kuburyo tubonye ushaka kubyangiza twamushyikiriza abayobozi.”
Ngoga Thelesphore, ushinzwe imicungire ya pariki z’igihugu mu kigo cy’igihugu Iterambere RDB avuga ko bashora mu mishinga y’uburezi mu rwego rwo kugira ngo abaturiye za pariki barusheho gusobanurirwa kuyibungabunga ariko kandi ngo hari n’indi mishinga itandukanye batera inkunga.
Ati “Ntabwo ari imishinga y’Uburezi gusa ariko n’ibindi bikorwa bishobora kuzamura abaturage kugira ngo banabone ko parike baturiye bagomba kugira uruhare mu kuyibungabunga. Abaturage nibiga bakamenya nibwo tuzabasha kubasobanurira akamaro ka parike bakakumva. Umwana aziga narangiza ajye gushaka akazi aho kujya gushimuta muri pariki. ”
Ibi byumba by’amashuri 11 byatwaye miliyoni zisaga 64, ni mu gihe amafaranga yagenewe gukora imishinga mu mirenge 7 ikora kuri Nyungwe muri Nyamasheke ari miliyoni 423.

Title: Maria Sharapova n’umukunzi we bahishuye ibihe bidasanzwe bagize ubwo basuraga u Rwanda na Botswana
Body:
Umukinnyi ukomeye wa Tennis, Umurusiyakazi Maria Yuryevna Sharapova w’imyaka 32, yagarutse ku bihe bidasanzwe yagiriye mu Rwanda, ubwo mu Ugushyingo 2019 yasuraga ibyiza byarwo, ari kumwe n’umukunzi we Alexander Gilkes w’imyaka 40.
Umukinnyi ukomeye wa Tennis, Umurusiyakazi Maria Yuryevna Sharapova w’imyaka 32, yagarutse ku bihe bidasanzwe yagiriye mu Rwanda, ubwo mu Ugushyingo 2019 yasuraga ibyiza byarwo, ari kumwe n’umukunzi we Alexander Gilkes w’imyaka 40.
Mu nyandiko yasohotse mu kinyamakuru Vogue cyo mu Bwongereza, Sharapova na Alexander bagaruka ku bihe bidasanzwe bagiriye mu Rwanda na Botswana umwaka ushize, aho babonye inyamaswa zinyuranye bagahura n’abantu batandukanye.
Maria atangirira kuri Botswana, aho bageze n’indege bakahagirira igice cya mbere cy’urugendo rwabo rw’iminsi ine bamaze basura ibyiza nyaburanga binyuranye.
Muri Botswana baraye muri Wilderness Vumbura Plains amajoro abiri. Ku munsi wa mbere basuye inyamaswa zitandukanye zirimo intare mbere yo kwerekeza mu Rwanda kureba ingagi zitaba ahandi ku Isi.
Alexander avuga ko muri icyo gihugu babonye inyamaswa zitandukanye zirimo intare, imvubu, ingona, imparage, udusumbashyamba n’izindi. Maria yongeraho ko banabonye ingwe n’imwe mu nyamaswa ibarizwa mu muryango w’ibisimba bitanu bikaze cyangwa ‘Big Five.
Yakomeje ati “Ingwe zo zari zitangaje cyane; twaricaye twitegereza zirimo gushaka amafunguro y’umugoroba, zikikinga ku mashami y’ibiti ziteze Impala zicaracara. Mu ijoro ryakeye, nakangutse mbona Inzovu irimo kunywa amazi muri piscine yacu.”
 “Nabanje gukeka ko mbonye Intare irimo kugenda inyuma y’inzu yacu, ariko Alexander arambwira ngo nimpumure ni ingwe – nk’aho ari byo biroroshya ikibazo!”
Nyuma yo gusura ibyo byiza nyaburanga, Alexander yavuze uburyo berekeje muri Bisate Lodge mu Ruhengeli, hoteli igizwe n’inzu esheshatu ziteye mu buryo bwihariye, aho uba witegeye Ikirunga cya Bisoke n’indi misozi itatse u Rwanda.
Ati “Ni mu gihe cy’imvura, turagerageza kota ku muriro ku mugoroba, ari nako tureba uko ibihe bigenda bihinduka buri minota 30. Batubwiye ko inkende ndetse rimwe na rimwe ingagi zishobora kuza hafi y’inzu.”
Maria Sharapova ahita avuga uburyo babonye inkende mbere y’ingagi, ariko aho baziboneye, bifuje kuba baramaranye nazo igihe cyose bamaze basura ibyiza by’aka karere.
Yakomeje “Uburyo uhura n’ibi bisamuntu wiyoroheje ntabwo nzabyibagirwa. Ni umunsi wacu wa nyuma, ariko ntabwo nshaka kuhava.”
Alexander avuga uburyo mu ijoro ryabo rya nyuma mbere yo gusura Johannesburg muri Afurika y’Epfo, batewe ishema no guhura na Perezida Paul Kagame.
Ati “Birashimishije iyo urebye ibyo yabashije kugeraho mu myaka 25 nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, akunga abantu kandi ni abaturage beza cyane. Uyu munsi buri kwezi u Rwanda rugira umunsi wo gukora isuku rusange, Guverinoma igizwe n’abagabo n’abagore 50/50, ubukungu bukomeje gutera imbere. Sitwe tuzabona tugarutse.”
Maria Sharapova yabaye nimero ya mbere ku Isi guhera mu 2005, ariko kuri ubu ari kubarizwa ku mwanya wa 369 nyuma yo kwitabira amarushanwa 12 gusa mu mwaka ushize.

Title: RDB yahuguye abayobora ba mukerarugendo ku mateka y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu
Body:
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) ku bufatanye na Minsiteri y’Ingabo, cyatangije amahugurwa y’iminsi 15 ku bantu 30 bayobora ba mukerarugendo, mu rwego rwo kubongerera ubumenyi kuri gahunda nshya yinjijwe mu rwego rw’ubukerarugendo, yerekeye amateka y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu ‘Rwanda Liberation History Tourism trail’.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) ku bufatanye na Minsiteri y’Ingabo, cyatangije amahugurwa y’iminsi 15 ku bantu 30 bayobora ba mukerarugendo, mu rwego rwo kubongerera ubumenyi kuri gahunda nshya yinjijwe mu rwego rw’ubukerarugendo, yerekeye amateka y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu ‘Rwanda Liberation History Tourism trail’.
Liberation History Tourism Trail ni gahunda nshya yinjijwe mu rwego rw’ubukerarugendo, igamije gusobanurira ba mukerarugendo b’abanyarwanda n’abanyamahanga, amateka y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu n’impamvu rwabayeho.
Igizwe n’urugendo runyura ahantu (sites) 29 mu turere dutandatu tw’u Rwanda, hafite icyo hasobanuye gikomeye ku rugamba rwo kubohora igihugu rwatangiye ku itariki 1 Ukwakira 1990 rukarangira ku itariki 4 Nyakanga 1994.
Kuri uyu wa mbere tariki 3 Gashyantare 2020, Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere na Minisiteri y’Ingabo, batangiye guhugura abayobora ba mukerarugendo n’abafatanyabikorwa b’urwego rw’ubukerarugendo hagamijwe kubongerera ubushobozi n’ubumenyi bwo gusobanurira abo bayobora iby’amateka y’aho hantu.
Umuyobozi w’ishami ry’amabwiriza agenga ubukerarugendo muri RDB, Emmanuel Nsabimana yavuze ko muri ayo mahugurwa bazasobanurirwa byinshi ku hantu habumbatiye amateka y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu ndetse bakanahasura.
Ati “Amateka y’urugamba rwo kubobohra igihugu mu bukerarugendo ni igice gikomeye mu mateka n’umurage mu guteza imbere ubukerarugendo. Twateguye amahugurwa ku bayobora ba mukerarugendo ngo tubongerere ubumenyi kuri urwo ruhererekane. Hari ibyo bigira hano ariko bazajye no kuhasura kugira ngo bazafashe ba mukerarugendo mu buryo bwuzuye.”
Umugaba w’Ingabo zirwanira mu kirere, Maj Gen Emmanuel Bayingana; yavuze ko kumenya amateka y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu bizatuma abo basobanurira by’umwihariko abakiri bato bamenya impamvu rwabayeho.
Ati “Twishimiye gukorana n’abayobora ba mukerarrugendo, tubongerera ubumenyi ku mateka y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu no kubafasha kwigisha abakiri bato kumenya impamvu y’urwo rugamba.”
Ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku mateka y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, bwatangijwe ku mugaragaro muri Kanama 2019.

Title: Mbatembereze i Strasbourg, Umujyi ubumbatiye amateka y’Abafaransa n’Abadage (Amafoto)
Body:
Strasbourg ni umwe mu Mijyi y’u Bufaransa ibumbatiye amateka menshi, ndetse iryoheye ubukerarugendo. Ku muntu ukunda gutembera agenda n’amaguru cyangwa n’igare, ni hamwe mu hantu wakwishimira.
Strasbourg ni umwe mu Mijyi y’u Bufaransa ibumbatiye amateka menshi, ndetse iryoheye ubukerarugendo. Ku muntu ukunda gutembera agenda n’amaguru cyangwa n’igare, ni hamwe mu hantu wakwishimira.
Ni umujyi uhana imbibi n’u Budage ndetse ubitse amateka menshi hagati y’ibi bihugu byombi, uherereye mu gace ka Alsace. Ntabwo ari umujyi utuwe cyane kuko uri ku buso bwa kilometero kare 7826, ibarura ryo mu 2017 rigaragaza ko wari utuwe n’abaturage 280966.
Ufatwa nk’Umurwa Mukuru w’u Burayi kubera ko ariwo ubarizwamo ibikorwa by’inama y’ubujyanama bw’u Burayi, Urukiko rw’u Burayi rw’uburenganzira bwa muntu, Inteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Burayi n’ibindi.
Ni umujyi kandi ubarizwamo ibikorwa byinshi bibungabungwa na UNESCO nk’umutungo kamere w’Isi. Muri ibyo harimo nka Cathédrale Notre-Dame de Strasbourg n’agace gakundwa na ba mukerarugendo kazwi kitwa Petite France.
Ni agace karimo imigezi myinshi ndetse mu myaka yo hambere kakundaga kubamo abarobyi cyane, magingo aya ni ko gace gasurwa cyane muri Strasbourg yose.
Imiterere yako igaragaza imyubakire yo mu Bufaransa kera mu kinyejana cya 17 ari nayo mpamvu UNESCO yahisemo kugashyira mu duce tubungabunzwe kubera amateka yako.
Naho Cathédrale Notre-Dame de Strasbourg igizwe n’inyubako zigaragaza amateka ya kera y’Abaromani, ndetse igaragazwa nk’urugero rwiza rwo kwerekana amateka yo hambere dore ko mu myaka ya 1647 na 1874 yabaye inzu ya mbere ndende ku Isi, ireshya na metero 142.
Uyu munsi ni kiliziya iri mu nsengero esheshatu ndende mu mateka y’Isi ndetse yihariye agahigo ko kuba ariyo ya mbere ndende mu mateka y’Isi yubatswe hagati y’ikinyejana cya Gatanu n’icya 15.
Umusizi Victor Hugo n’umudage Goethe nawe wari umwanditsi, bakunze kuyigereranya n’igiti cy’Imana bashaka kuvuga uburebure bwayo. Bitewe n’uko iteye, ahantu hose hari umusozi muri uyu mujyi, iyo uwugiyeho bituma umuntu abasha kuyibona neza
Ku bantu bakunda gutembera bihera amaso ibyiza bitatse Isi, ni umujyi mwiza cyane. Mu 2009 ubwo habaga inama ya NATO, Barack Obama na Chancelier w’u Budage, Angela Merkel, bakoze urugendo rw’amateka n’amaguru, bava Strasbourg bagera mu Kehl banyuze ku kiraro cya Passerelle des Deux Rives cyubatswe mu 2004 nk’ikimenyetso cy’ubumwe mu Burayi. Nta passport bisaba ku muntu ushaka gukora uru rugendo nk’urwabo, ugera mu Budage mu gace ka Rhine.
Alsace agace ka Strasbourg kazwi ho kugira umuvinyo uryoheye ijigo ndetse n’inzoga nyinshi zituruka mu baturanyi b’Abadage. Mu masaha y’ijoro usanga hafi ya Notre-Dame hari abantu benshi bari ku gacupa bungurana ibitekerezo,
Umujyi wa Strasbourg guhera mu 2008 uyoborwa na Roland Ries nyuma yo kuba Umwarimu muri Kaminuza ya Strasbourg n’Umusenateri muri aka Karere imyaka icyenda.
Amafoto: Karirima A. Ngarambe

Title: Twitege Visit Rwanda muri Formula 1 na NBA?
Body:
Guhera mu kwezi gushize, Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangiye ubufatanye n’ikipe ya Paris St Germain yo mu Bufaransa, buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije kureshya abashoramari no gukomeza kuba icyerekezo kibereye ubukerarugendo.
Guhera mu kwezi gushize, Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangiye ubufatanye n’ikipe ya Paris St Germain yo mu Bufaransa, buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije kureshya abashoramari no gukomeza kuba icyerekezo kibereye ubukerarugendo.
Muri ubu bufatanye, ikirango cya Visit Rwanda kigaragazwa kuri Stade ya Parc des Princes aho PSG yakirira imikino yayo ndetse no ku mugongo ku myenda iyi kipe ikoresha mu myitozo no mu gihe cyo kwishyushya mbere y’imikino, yaba iyo yambara yasuye indi kipe cyangwa iyo yambara iwayo muri Shampiyona y’u Bufaransa, Ligue 1 mu gihe kandi aya magambo agaragara ku myambaro y’ikipe y’abagore.
Mu masezerano harimo kandi icyumweru cy’imishinga y’abanyempano b’abanyarwanda n’Abafaransa. Icyo cyumweru cyiswe “Semaine du Rwanda à Paris” kizajya gitegurwa na PSG mu kumenyekanisha ibintu byose bikorerwa mu Rwanda.
Ubu bufatanye bwatangajwe nyuma y’umwaka umwe n’igice, RDB itangiye gukorana n’ikipe ya Arsenal yo mu Bwongereza, aho binyuze muri Visit Rwanda, iyi kipe yo mu Mujyi wa Londres yamamaza ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda.
Kuva icyo gihe, hari abanyabigwi benshi bakomeye ba Arsenal baje mu Rwanda barimo Tony Adams wabaye kapiteni wayo igihe kirekire, Lauren Etame Mayer, Alex Scott wabaye kapiteni w’ikipe y’abagore na David Luiz kuri ubu ukinira iyi kipe, bose baje mu Rwanda.
Muri ubu bufatanye kandi, abatoza babiri b’Ingimbi za Arsenal FC, Simon McManus usanzwe ari Umutoza Mukuru w’Amashuri yigisha umupira w’amaguru ya Arsenal na Kerry Green, bahugura ab’Abanyarwanda mu kubafasha kubatoza umupira ugezweho nk’uwo iyi kipe ikina.
RDB ivuga ko kuva u Rwanda rutangiye gukorana na Arsenal binyuze muri Visit Rwanda mu 2018, ba mukerarungo baza mu Rwanda bamaze kugera kuri miliyoni imwe na 700 (byatangajwe mu Ukuboza 2019) ndetse yizeye ko bazakomeza kwiyongera mu myaka iri imbere.
Ese birashoboka ko tuzabona Visit Rwanda mu marushanwa nka Tour de France, Formula 1 cyangwa NBA?
Imwe mu mpamvu ituma habaho ubu bufatanye bw’u Rwanda n’amakipe akomeye i Burayi, ni ugutekereza kure kugira ngo u Rwanda ruzabe igihugu gikize mu myaka iri imbere ndetse n’Abanyarwanda bagire ubushobozi buhagije bwo gukora ibyishimirwa n’abanyamahanga.
Tour de France niryo siganwa rya mbere ry’amagare rikomeye ku Isi, Formula 1 naryo ni isiganwa rya mbere rikomeye mu mukino wo gusiganwa mu modoka mu gihe NBA yo muri Amerika ari yo Shampiyona ya Basketball ikunzwe na benshi ku Isi.
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo no kubungabunga za Pariki muri RDB, Ariella Kageruka, yavuze ko bishoboka ko u Rwanda rwagirana ubufatanye n’imwe mu makipe agaragara muri aya marushanwa kuko byose bisaba kwiha intego ndetse bikagira uko bikorwa.
Ati “Sinavuga ko hari igihe runaka bizabera, ariko nta kintu kidashoboka kuko iyo urebye ikintu gisabwa ni ukureba niba ibikorwaremezo dufite bihuye n’ibyo. Nko kuri Formula 1, icya mbere ni imihanda kandi nkeka imbaraga Leta yashyize mu kubaka imihanda dushobora kuyibyaza umusaruro.”
“Ku kwerekana Visit Rwanda muri NBA, BAL (Basketball Africa League yashyizweho na NBA) yo ubwo yaje aha, mwabonye ko ikipe yacu (Patriots BBC) yari ihagarariye u Rwanda yari yambaye Visit Rwanda. Ni ukuvuga ngo ni ukugenda intambwe ku ntambwe kandi byose birashoboka. Icya mbere ni ukugira ngo tubyaze umusaruro ubufatanye dufite uyu munsi kuko ni ukubanza kureba icyo dukuramo, tukaba twava mu mupira w’amaguru tukajya muri Basketball.”
Kageruka avuga ko nubwo kuri ubu ubufatanye bw’u Rwanda mu bukerarugendo bushingiye ku mugabane w’u Burayi, bitabuza ko n’Abanyamerika barumenya kuko nka Arsenal ikunda gukorerayo imyiteguro ya Shampiyona ijyanye n’itangazamakuru ryayo rigari ndetse ubwo David Luiz yazaga mu Rwanda, byavuzwe cyane muri Brésil.
Ni iki cyakorwa ngo Siporo y’u Rwanda itange umusaruro mu bukungu bw’igihugu? 
Siporo ni umwe mu nkingi z’iterambere u Rwanda rushaka kubakiraho ndetse igihugu kiri gushora cyane mu mikino kuko bitanga icyerekezo cyiza cy’igihugu ndetse bigafasha n’Abanyarwanda gutera imbere.
Mu kiganiro yatanze ubwo yari yatumiwe mu mahugurwa yahuje abagize ingaga za Siporo, yateguwe n’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi, Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo no kubungabunga za Pariki muri RDB, Ariella Kageruka, yavuze ko muri Siporo hari amahirwe menshi arimo ashobora kwinjiriza igihugu nko gukora imyenda n’inkweto bya Siporo.
Kageruka yakomeje avuga ko itangazamakuru rishobora kwifashishwa mu kumenyakanisha Siporo y’u Rwanda, abakinnyi n’abatoza b’Abanyarwanda bagahabawa amahugurwa abafasha kugira ubumenyi buri ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
Ati “Hari uburyo bwinshi bwo kubyaza umusaruro muri siporo, nko gushyiraho inganda zikora ibikoresho bya Siporo mu gihugu. Mu bijyanye n’ubukerarungo bushingiye kuri siporo, ubufatanye twagiranye n’abatwamamaza bwarengeje ibyo twari twiteze. Twari twiteze ko binyuze muri uku kwamamaza tuzabona miliyoni 28£, ariko mu mwaka umwe twabonye miliyoni 36£.”
Indi nzira yafasha u Rwanda kwinjiza binyuze muri Siporo hari ugutegura amarushanwa akomeye abera mu gihugu hakanategurwa ibikorwa byishimirwa n’Abanyamahanga baje muri iyi mikino, nko gusura ingagi n’izindi Pariki, gutembera mu Kivu no kuzamuka imisozi.
RDB ivuga ko kuva u Rwanda rutangiye gukorana na Arsenal mu myaka ibiri ishize, hamaze gutozwa abana n’abatoza basaga 120 ndetse no mu bufatanye na Paris Saint-Germain hazakorwa gahunda nk’iyi.
Inzu y’imikino ya Kigali Arena, ikibuga cya Cricket kiri i Gahanga, ikibuga cya Kigali Golf Club kiri kuvugurwa biri mu byitezweho kuzazamura ubukeragendo bunyuze muri siporo.
Mu 2017 ubukerarugendo bwinjirije u Rwanda miliyoni 401 z’Amadolari, ariko intego ya Guverinoma ni ukuzamura ayo madolari akaba miliyoni 800 mu 2024.
Amafoto: Umurerwa Delphin

Title: RDB yitabiriye imurika rikomeye ry’ubukerarugendo muri Amerika
Body:
Itsinda rimenyekanisha ubukererugendo bw’u Rwanda mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) hamwe n’ibigo byigenga by’ubukererugendo mu Rwanda bitabiriye imurika ry’ubukerarugendo rikomeye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika rizwi nka New York Times Travel Show.
Itsinda rimenyekanisha ubukererugendo bw’u Rwanda mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere (RDB) hamwe n’ibigo byigenga by’ubukererugendo mu Rwanda bitabiriye imurika ry’ubukerarugendo rikomeye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika rizwi nka New York Times Travel Show.
Iri murika ry’ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo riri mu ya mbere akomeye muri Amerika y’Amajyaruguru. Riri kubera mu Mujyi wa Manhattan ahazwi nka Jacob K.Javits. Ryatangaiye taraiki 24 Mutarama, rirasozwa kuri iki Cyumweru tariki 26 Mutarama 2020.
Nyuma y’imurika, itsinda rihagarariye u Rwanda rizakomereza ibikorwa byo kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda hirya no hino mu bice bya Leta ya California nka San Diego, Orange County na Los Angeles mbere yo kugaruka mu Rwanda.
Ibigo byigenga bikora iby’ubukerarugendo bihagarariye u Rwanda birimo Mantis Rwanda, Akagera Aviation, New Dawn Associates, Heritage Safaris, Far Trek Africa Safaris, Silverback Africa na FCM Charleston.
Mu byo bari kwerekana harimo umuco w’u Rwanda, urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima ruboneka mu Rwanda, ubwiza bw’u Rwanda n’ibijyanye no kwakira abakerarugendo.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubukerarugendo muri RDB, Belise Kariza, yavuze ko muri Amerika y’Amajyaruguru ari hamwe mu haturuka ba mukerarugendo benshi basura u Rwanda, ko ari iby’ingenzi gukomeza kuhamenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda.
Ati “Kuba twitabiriye iri murika rizwi rya New York Times Travel Show, tukagaragara mu bandi bamurika basaga 700 baturutse hirya no hino ku isi biratuma abitabiriye bamenya ko u Rwanda ari ahantu heza ho gusura ku isi. Twiteguye guha ikaze abakerarugendo bashaka gusura igihugu cyacu cyiza.”
New York Times Travel Show ni imurika ry’ubukerarugendo riri mu akomeye ku Isi. Ryitabirwa n’abantu basaga 35 000, barimo abamurika basaga 700 bavuye mu bihugu bigera ku 175.

Title: Mu basuye Pariki y’Akagera umwaka ushize, 48 % ni Abanyarwanda
Body:
Ubuyobozi bwa Pariki y’Akagera bwatangaje ko umwaka ushize iyo pariki yasuwe n’abakerarugendo 49 000, muri bo 48% ari Abanyarwanda.
Ubuyobozi bwa Pariki y’Akagera bwatangaje ko umwaka ushize iyo pariki yasuwe n’abakerarugendo 49 000, muri bo 48% ari Abanyarwanda.
Ugereranyije abasuye iyo pariki umwaka ushize n’abayisuye mu 2018, habayeho ubwiyongere bwa 12 %.
Parike #Akagera yakiriye abakerurgendo basaga 49,000 muri 2019. Habayeho ubwiyongere bwa 12% ugereranyije na 2018. 48% by'abasuye parike uyu mwaka ni ABANYARWANDA. #Ibyaranze2019#VisitRwanda
— Akagera (@AkageraPark) January 21, 2020
Iyi pariki kuva mu 2010 icungwa n’umuryango wita ku rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima, African Parks. Mu myaka itanu ishize hagiye haba amavugurura agamije guteza imbere urusobe rw’ibinyabuzima muri iyo pariki no kurushaho gukurura ba mukerarugendo bayisura.
Nubwo umubare w’amafaranga yinjijwe umwaka ushize utatangajwe, ashobora kuba yariyongereye ugendeye ku bwiyongere bw’abayisuye.
African Parks icunga iyi pariki igaragaza ko amafaranga yinjiza yavuye ku madolari 200 000 mu 2010, akagera ku madolari miliyoni ebyiri mu 2018. Ibyo byatumye iyo pariki ibasha kwihaza ku ngengo y’imari ikoresha ku kigero cya 75 %.
Iyi pariki irimo amoko atandukanye y’inyamaswa, ikaba imwe mu zikomeye muri Afurika nyuma yo kuzanwamo intare n’inkura.
Pariki y’Akagera irimo n’izindi nyamaswa zitandukanye nk’impala n’imparage, impongo, inzovu, imvubu, ingwe, inyoni z’amoko asaga 500 n’ibindi.
Mu 2015, Pariki y’Akagera yazanywemo intare zaherukagamo mu myaka ya 1990. Mu mwaka wa mbere zigaruwemo, umubare w’intare wikubye kabiri kuko zahise zibyara ibyana 11. Mu 2017, hazanywemo izindi ntare ebyiri z’ingabo zivuye muri Afurika y’Epfo.
Mu 2017 kandi, muri iyo pariki hazanywemo inkura z’umukara 18, nyuma y’imyaka icumi ubwo bwoko bw’inyamaswa bwarazimiye.
Umwaka ushize, Pariki y’Akagera yari yasuwe n’abakerarugendo 44000, kimwe cya kabiri ari Abanyarwanda.

Title: Ibigo nyarwanda byacanye umucyo mu imurikagurisha ry’ubukerarugendo mu Buholandi (Amafoto)
Body:
Ibigo nyarwanda byacanye umucyo mu imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs rimaze iminsi ribera mu Buholandi mu mujyi witwa Utrecht.
Ibigo nyarwanda byacanye umucyo mu imurikagurisha rya Vakantiebeurs rimaze iminsi ribera mu Buholandi mu mujyi witwa Utrecht.
Ni imurikagurisha riri kuba ku nshuro ya 13, ryabereyemwo gahunda zitandukanye mu bijyanye no kumenyekanisha u Rwanda, aho ryitabiriwe n’ibigo byo mu Rwanda bitandukanye bikora ibijyanye n’ubukerarugendo n’izindi serivisi zijyana nabwo.
Ryitabiriwe uyu mwaka n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, Sosiyete Nyarwanda y’Ubwikorezi bwo mu Kirere, RwandAir, Ambasade y’u Rwanda mu Buholandi n’ibigo by’ubukerarugendo birimo Amahoro Tours, Palast Tours and Travel, Heritage Safaris na Wildlife Tours-Rwanda.
 Umuyobozi w’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo mu rugaga rw’abikorera (PSF), Rutagarama Aimable, yabwiye IGIHE ko kwitabira iryo murikagurisha ari ubundi uburyo bwiza bwo kongera abakerarugendo basura u Rwanda.
Yagize ati “ Turashimira rwose Leta y’u Rwanda uburyo idahwema kudufasha no gushyiramwo imbaraga ngo ubukerarugendo bukomeze butere imbere kandi natwe tubukora tukagiramo inyungu.”
Yakomeje agira ati “ Iyo urebye muri iyi myaka ishize biragaragara cyane ko ubukerarugendo bwateye intamwe igaragara. Natwe umuntu ku giti cye muri twe tubukora nk’umwuga ni ugushyiraho akacu ntitubiharire gusa Leta, twongera ingufu n’umubare w’ibigo bikora ubukerarugendo, dukomeza kubaka amahoteli n’ibindi bijyanye no kwakira abantu.”
Muri gahunda yo kumenyekanisha u Rwanda izwi nka ‘Visit Rwanda’, abahagarariye ibigo byo mu Rwanda beretse bagenzi babo bo mu Buholandi amahirwe ari mu bukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda n’uko yabyazwa umusaruro.
Abayobozi baryitabiriye barimo Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda mu Buholandi, Karabaranga Jean Pierre; Umuyobozi muri RDB Ushinzwe kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo, Mutesi Linda na Ildephonse Kambogo ushinzwe ibijyanye n’Ubusesenguzi mu by’Ubukerarugendo.
Vakantiebeurs ni imurika rifatwa nk’amahirwe ku bukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda yo gukorana n’ubw’u Buholandi n’andi masoko akomeye yabufasha gutera imbere.
Umuyobozi uhagarariye Visit Rwanda mu Buholandi, Harry Betist, yagize ati “Ni umwanya mwiza wo guhura n’abafatanyabikorwa bacu no kwishimira intambwe ubukerarugendo bumaze gutera no kureba uko itasubira inyuma.’’
Kuri ubu isoko ryo mu Buholandi riza mu myanya umunani ya mbere, mu kugira abakerarugendo benshi bakorana n’u Rwanda. Abarusura biyongereyeho 11.9 %, bavuye ku 4918 mu 2017 bagera kuri 5501 mu 2018.
Ibi bikorwa by’imurikagurisha rigamije kumenyekanisha ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda byiyongera ku bikorwa bikomeye mu kubumenyekanisha birimo amasezerano rwasinye n’amakipe ya Arsenal na Paris St Germain ndetse na Filime ya Rwanda: The Royal Tour.

Title: Wild Connector Safaris yatanze umwihariko mu gutembereza abantu Pariki y’Akagera mu minsi mikuru
Body:
Sosiyete itembereza ba mukerarugendo Wild Connector Safaris igiye gufasha abanyarwanda gutembera ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda biboneka muri Pariki ya y’Akagera muri iyi minsi mikuru isoza umwaka.
Sosiyete itembereza ba mukerarugendo Wild Connector Safaris igiye gufasha abanyarwanda gutembera ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda biboneka muri Pariki ya y’Akagera muri iyi minsi mikuru isoza umwaka.
Uruzinduko ruzaba kuwa Gatandatu tariki 21 Ukuboza 2019, muri Pariki y’Akagera icumbikiye inyamaswa nyinshi.
Abazitabira bazabasha kubona amoko atandukanye y’inyamaswa ziba muri iyo pariki, imwe mu zikomeye muri Afurika nyuma yo kuzanwamo intare n’inkura.
Pariki y’akagera irimo n’izindi nyamaswa zitanduknaye nk’impala n’imparage, impongo, inzovu, imvubu, ingwe, inyoni z’amoko asaga 500 n’ibindi.
Ushinzwe iyamamazabikorwa muri Wild Connector Safaris , Rugamba Alexis yakanguriye cyane cyane ababyeyi kuzana abana bari mu biruhuko, babafasha gusobanukirwa neza ibitatse igihugu cyabo.
Ni n’umwanya kandi ku muryango n’abakundana gusoza umwaka bishimye batembera ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda.
Ati “Iki gihe abana benshi baba bari mu biruhuko. Ni umwanya mwiza kuri bo wo gutembera no kumenya byinshi ku gihugu cyabo. N’abakuru ni uko, muze dusure pariki yacu y’Akagera tunezezwe no kureba inyamaswa za mbere zikomeye ku isi.”
Kujyana na Wild Connector Safaris muri Pariki y’Akagera, umuntu umwe arasabwa kwishyura amafaranga 30 000 Frw mu gihe abanyamahanga badaturuka mu muryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba bazishyura amadolari 110.
Muri ayo mafaranga harimo itike, uburenganzira bwo kwinjira muri pariki, ifunguro rya ku manywa, abakuyobora n’ibindi.
Abantu bakundana baziye rimwe ndetse n’abana bazagabanyirizwaho 10 %.
Undi mwihariko w’uru rugendo ni uko hazaba hari umufotozi wabigize umwuga uzafata amafoto kandi buri wese akazahabwa umwanya wo kubaza ibibazo byose ku bijyanye n’ibyiza bitatse u Rwanda.
Ku bindi bisobanuro kandi aha: Www.Wildconnectorsafaris.com

Title: Imbamutima z’inzego zitandukanye ku bufatanye bw’u Rwanda na PSG
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu nibwo Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangaje ko cyatangiye ubufatanye n’Ikipe ya Paris Saint Germain buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda, ubukerarugendo bwarwo n’umupira w’amaguru.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu nibwo Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangaje ko cyatangiye ubufatanye n’Ikipe ya Paris Saint Germain buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda, ubukerarugendo bwarwo n’umupira w’amaguru.
Inzego zitandukanye zirimo abakora mu bijyanye n’ubukerarugendo, abikorera, abashinzwe siporo n’abohereza ibikomoka ku buhinzi n’ubworozi bavuga ko bubumbatiye amahirwe menshi.
Muri ubu bufatanye, abakinnyi ba Paris Saint Germain n’abahoze bayikinira bazashobora gusura u Rwanda bagaragaze ibyiza by’u Rwanda bakoresheje imbuga nkoranyambaga zabo na PSG ibikore gutyo.
Umuyobozi w’Ishami ry’Ubukerarugendo muri RDB, Belise Kariza, avuga ko ‘gukoresha abakinnyi bazwi, bemerwa n’abantu benshi n’abafana babo ari ikintu cyiza kizadufasha mu imenyekanishabikorwa ryacu’.
Ikirango cya Visit Rwanda kigaragara muri Stade ya Parc des Princes nk’uburyo bwo kumenyekanisha ibikorwa. Ibi byaraye bitangiye mu mukino PSG yakiriyemo Nantes.
Visit Rwanda izajya igaragara ku mwambaro w’abakinnyi b’ikipe y’abagore ya PSG, ikaba igaragara ku myenda y’imyitozo y’abakinnyi yaba abagabo n’abagore, ikaba igaragara inyuma ku ikoti ryo kwishyushyanya mbere y’umukino.
Mu guteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda, Made in Rwanda, mu bufatanye harimo igikorwa cyitwa ‘Icyumweru i Paris’, aho abakora imyenda, ubugeni, ubukorikori, bazashobora kugaragaza ibikorwa byabo mu Bufaransa icyumweru cyose ku bufatanye na Paris Saint Germain.
Kariza avuga ko ubu bufatanye ari ‘ibintu bishimishije kuri twe, turabona amahirwe menshi afunguka hano by’umwihariko ku bikorerwa mu Rwanda no kubona Visit Rwanda igera kure ku bantu benshi’.
Perezida wa Kabiri w’igice cy’abakora ibijyanye n’Ubukerarugendo akaba n’Umuyobozi wa Serena Hotel mu Rwanda, Daniel Sambai, mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru kuri uyu wa Kane yavuze ko ubu bufatanye babubonamo amahirwe menshi.
Ati “Nk’urwego rw’ubukerarugendo turishimye ku bw’ubu bufatanye, twiteze kubona ubukerarugendo butera imbere nk’uko butahwemye gutera imbere mu myaka ishize, ni iby’agaciro kuri twe.”
Muri ubu bufatanye biteganyijwe ko hazabaho gahunda z’imyitozo ku bana b’abahungu n’abakobwa, gushaka uko amashuri y’umupira w’amaguru ‘academy’ yo mu Rwanda yazakorana n’Ikipe ya PSG.
Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Minisiteri ya Siporo, Shema Maboko Didier, yavuze ko ubu bufatanye buzateza imbere siporo cyane.
Ati “Nishimiye ubu bufatanye na PSG nk’ushinzwe siporo, aya ni amahirwe meza kuri twe yo gukomeza guteza imbere siporo yacu by’umwihariko mu rwego rw’umupira w’amaguru.”
Muri ubu bufatanye kandi ikawa n’icyayi cy’u Rwanda kizaba gicuruzwa cyonyine muri Stade ya Parc des Princes, aho abafana baturutse ahantu hose bazashobora kunywa ku cyayi n’ikawa by’u Rwanda.
Uwacu Cynthia wo mu kigo gishinzwe kohereza mu mahanga ibikomoka ku Buhinzi n’Ubworozi (NAEB) yavuze ko ibi bizafasha mu kohereza ibicuruzwa mu mahanga kuko n’ubundi ikawa n’icyayi bitoherezwaga cyane mu Bufaransa.
Ati “Tugendeye ku mwaka tumaze dukorana na Alibaba ubona ikawa twohereza mu Bushinwa yariyongereyeho 700%, noneho tubirebe muri stade irimo abantu ibihumbi 47 buri cyumweru turimo gutanga icyayi n’ikawa twenyine.”
“Turitegura iterambere rinini atari gusa amafaranga tuzakura muri ubu bufatanye ahubwo n’abantu bazaba baje ku mukino baturutse hirya no hino ku Isi bazabimenya, kuko ikawa n’icyayi cyacu bishimwa cyane ku Isi yose.
Ubu bufatanye bw’u Rwanda na PSG buriyongera kubwo rwagiranye na Arsenal FC yo mu Bwongereza. Icyakora bwombi nta kiguzi cyabwo gitangazwa nk’uko impande zombi zabyemeranyijwe ko bikomeza kuba ibanga.

Title: Icyo u Rwanda ruzungukira mu bufatanye na PSG n’impamvu rwaguye imbibi zikarenga ubukerarugendo
Body:
Guhera kuri uyu wa Gatatu, Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangiye ubufatanye n’ikipe ya Paris St Germain yo mu Bufaransa, buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije kureshya abashoramari no gukomeza kuba icyerekezo kibereye ubukerarugendo.
Guhera kuri uyu wa Gatatu, Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubukerarugendo, RDB, cyatangiye ubufatanye n’ikipe ya Paris St Germain yo mu Bufaransa, buzamara imyaka itatu bugamije kureshya abashoramari no gukomeza kuba icyerekezo kibereye ubukerarugendo.
Muri ubu bufatanye, ikirango cya Visit Rwanda kigaragazwa kuri Stade ya Parc des Princes aho PSG yakirira imikino yayo ndetse no ku mugongo ku myenda iyi kipe ikoresha mu myitozo no mu gihe cyo kwishyushya mbere y’imikino, yaba iyo yambara yasuye indi kipe cyangwa iyo yambara iwayo muri Shampiyona y’u Bufaransa, Ligue 1.
Ubu bufatanye bwatangajwe nyuma y’umwaka umwe n’igice, RDB itangiye gukorana n’ikipe ya Arsenal yo mu Bwongereza, aho binyuze muri Visit Rwanda, iyi kipe yo mu Mujyi wa Londres yamamaza ubukerarugendo bw’u Rwanda.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na Televiziyo Rwanda, Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Iterambere, RDB, Clare Akamanzi, yavuze ko impamvu u Rwanda rwahisemo kurenga imbibi z’ubukerarugendo muri ubu bufatanye rwagiranye na Paris Saint-Germain ari ukugira ngo bifashe no kuzamura Abanyarwanda binyuze mu byo bakora, bimenyekane no mu mahanga.
Ati "Mu gukomeza guteza imbere ubukungu bw’igihugu cyacu n’ubukungu ndetse n’ubuzima bw’abanyarwanda dukomeza gushaka uburyo twakongera ubushobozi bw’ubukungu bwacu mu gihugu ndetse no hanze y’igihugu.’’
’’ Twasinyanye nabo kugira ngo tumenyekanishe Visit Rwanda mu rwego rw’ubukerarugendo, ariko ntabwo aribyo gusa no mu rwego rwa Visit Rwanda tuzakoresha n’abakurikirana PSG mu Bufaransa n’ahandi hose, bafitanye ubufatanye n’abantu bari mu nzego zitandukanye, yaba abakora imyenda, gukora icyayi n’ikawa […]. Tuzacuruza icyayi cyacu muri Parc des Princes aho PSG ikinira n’ikawa imenyekanishwe mu Bufarana ndetse ducuruze byinshi kurushaho.’’
Akamanzi avuga ko ubu ari uburyo bwiza bwo kumenyekanisha ibikorerwa mu Rwanda n’Ubukerarungendo bwarwo kugira ngo abanyamahanga barusheho kubumenya ariko nabo baze bagure ibintu byo mu Rwanda.
Ati’’ Mu kugura ibyo bintu, bizatanga akazi ku Banyarwanda bakora ibi bintu, bakomeze kubikora kandi babikore ku bwinshi, babone amafaranga bitume n‘igihugu cyacu gikomeza gutera imbere.’’
Agaruka ku mpamvu ubufatanye na Paris Saint Germain butarebye gusa ku bukerarugendo, Akamanzi yavuze ko byatewe n’uburyo iyi kipe yo mu Bufaransa imeze ku buryo babona nayo ikoresha umupira w’amaguru mu kumenyekanisha bindi bikorwa bitandukanye abantu bakunda.
Ati’’ Impamvu twagiye mu bukerarugendo n’ibindi ni uko twabonye umufatanyabikorwa tugiye gusinyana na we [PSG] adakina umupira gusa, bakoresha umupira kugira ngo abantu bagaragaze ibintu bakunda, haba mu myidagaduro, umuco, byose barabishyigikira, bakagaragaza ko ushobora gukoresha umupira kugira ngo uteze imbere ibindi bintu bituma ubaho neza.’’
" Ni ukureba uburyo twakoresha izina bafite kugira ngo dukore ibindi bashyigikira mu buzima no mu bukungu. Niyo mpamvu twahisemo kugira ngo turenge ubukerarugendo, dushake uko twakorana duteza imbere ibikorerwa mu Rwanda.’’
Muri ubu bufatanye bw’u Rwanda na Paris Saint Germain, hazabaho kandi icyumweru cy’imishinga y’abanyempano b’abanyarwanda n’Abafaransa. Icyo cyumweru cyiswe “Semaine du Rwanda à Paris” kizajya gitegurwa na PSG mu kumenyekanisha ibintu byose bikorerwa mu Rwanda.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RDB avuga ko muri iki cyumweru Abanyarwanda bakora ibintu bitandukanye bazajya bahabwa umwanya wo kujya kubyerekana mu Mujyi wa Paris.
Ati"Tuzacuruza ikawa n’icyayi cy’u Rwanda muri Stade. Nta kindi gihugu kizabikora, nitwe gusa. Bivuze ko bazatumenya cyane kurusha uko batuzi ubu.’’
"Ntabwo ari ibyo gusa, tuzakomeza tumenyekanishe u Rwanda mu Bufaransa, buri mwaka tuzagira ikintu cyitwa ‘’Icyumweru muri Paris’’, aho tuzana abantu batandukanye bakora imyenda, bakora ubukorikori, bakora ibintu bitandukanye bashobora gucuruza hanze, tubahe umwanya wo kwerekana ibyo bintu no kwerekana Umuco wacu ku buryo bizatuma abantu baza mu Rwanda bakagura n’ibintu byaho.’’
Akamanzi yashimangiye ko ubufatanye u Rwanda ruri kugirana n’amakipe akomeye i Burayi bugamije gutekereza kure kugira ngo u Rwanda ruzabe igihugu gikize mu myaka iri imbere ndetse n’Abanyarwanda bagire ubushobozi buhagije bwo gukora ibyishimirwa n’abanyamahanga.
Ati "Turashaka gucuruza ibintu byinshi kurushaho hanze y’igihugu. Turashaka ko byakwiyongera mu bwinshi ndetse no mu bwiza bwabyo. Icyo tumaze kubona nk’igihugu ni uko tugomba kugira icyerekezo cy’igihe kirekire cyane. Dutekereze ngo mu myaka 10, 20 cyangwa 50 tuzaba turi hehe? Turifuza kuba igihugu gikize, Abanyarwanda bize kandi bafite ubushobozi, bashobora gukora ibintu bifite agaciro kari hejuru.’’
Umuyobozi wa RDB avuga ko kuri ubu umubano w’u Rwanda n’u Bufaransa ari mwiza ndetse bahisemo gukorana na Paris Saint Germain nk’ikipe ishaka kuzamura abato n’urubyiruko no gushyikira gukora ibintu binoze nk’uko bimeze no k’u Rwanda.
Yakomeje avuga ko kuba u Rwanda ruri gushora cyane mu mikino ari uko rwabonye ko bitanga icyerekezo cyiza cy’igihugu ndetse bizafasha n’Abanyarwanda gutera imbere.
Ati’’ Nk’igihugu turimo gushora mu mikino. Twubatse Kigali Arena kugira ngo Basketball ikinwe, hari ikibuga cya Cricket, hari amagare ndetse Abanyarwanda bitwara neza, hari Golf Club turi kubaka kugira ngo igere ku rwego mpuzamahanga, bigaragaza ko Leta iri gushora cyane mu mikino kugira ngo izamuke kandi nayo bizatuma itanga umusaruro mu bukungu bwacu.’’
PSG izagira uruhare mu kuzamura abakiri bato binyuze mu gushinga ishuri ry’umupira w’amaguru i Kigali, aho iyi kipe izajya itegura imyitozo y’abatoza n’abakiri bato mu kubafasha kugira ubunararibonye bw’iyi kipe ikomeye ku mugabane w’u Burayi, by’umwihariko yanditse amateka mu Bufaransa.
RDB ivuga kuva u Rwanda rutangiye gukorana na Arsenal binyuze muri Visit Rwanda mu mwaka ushize, kuri ubu ba mukerarungo baza mu Rwanda bamaze kugera kuri miliyoni imwe na 700 ndetse yizeye ko bazakomeza kwiyongera mu myaka iri imbere.

Title: Nyanza: Inzira z’Ubukerarugendo gakondo zahawe icyangombwa cyo mu rwego rwa mbere (Amafoto)
Body:
Inzira eshatu z’Ubukerarugendo gakondo zo mu Karere ka Nyanza [The Nyanza Cultural Trials] zahawe icyangombwa cy’uko zujuje ibisabwa ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gukorerwamo ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku kugenda n’amaguru zihabwa amanota 75.
Inzira eshatu z’Ubukerarugendo gakondo zo mu Karere ka Nyanza [The Nyanza Cultural Trials] zahawe icyangombwa cy’uko zujuje ibisabwa ku rwego rwo hejuru mu gukorerwamo ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku kugenda n’amaguru zihabwa amanota 75.
Ni igikorwa cyabaye kuri uyu wa Gatatu ubwo izo nzira zafungurwaga ku mugaragaro zihabwa n’amanota bitewe n’imiterere yazo igaragaza ibyiza ndangamateka na nyaburanga.
Cyitabiriwe n’abayobozi barimo Minisitiri w’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, Mbabazi Rosemary; Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ingoro z’Igihugu z’Umurage w’u Rwanda, Amb. Masozera Robert; Guverineri w’Intara y’Amajyepfo, Gasana Emmanuel na Perezida w’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku kugenda n’amaguru mu gihugu cy’u Budage, Klaus Eber, n’abandi.
Amanota yatanzwe n’abarimo inzobere mu bukerarugendo akaba na Perezida w’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku kugenda n’amaguru mu gihugu cy’u Budage, Klaus Eber.
Izo nzira zitwa Nyanza Cultural Trials ni eshatu zitandukanye ariko zuzuzanya.
Iya mbere yitwa ‘Royal Trail’ ifite kilometero 10 izenguruka Umujyi wa Nyanza igakikiza Ingoro z’Umurage ebyiri zihari ari zo Ingoro y’Abami mu Rukari n’Ingoro y’Umurage wo kwigira iherereye ku Rwesero ahahoze hatuye Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa.
Iyo nzira kandi inyura ahari ibindi byiza biranga amateka y’u Rwanda mu Karere ka Nyanza nk’Umusezero w’Abami i Mwima hatabarijwe Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa tariki ya 28 Nyakanga 1959; Umwami Kigeli V watabarijwe ku ya 15 Mutarama 2017 ndetse n’Umwamikazi Gicanda Rosalie wahatabarijwe tariki ya 20 Mata 1995.
Inzira ya kabiri yitwa ‘Big View’ y’ibirometero umunani ituruka mu Mujyi wa Nyanza ikagera ku musozi wa Remera. Iyo uri kuri uwo musozi wa Remera uba ushobora kureba ku ntera y’umurambararo wa kilometero 50.
Ubasha kureba imisozi itandukanye ikikije Nyanza ndetse waterera amaso kure ukaba wabona ibindi bice by’u Rwanda birimo n’ibirunga biri mu Majyaruguru y’igihugu.
Inzira ya gatatu yitwa ‘Gatagara Trail’ y’ibiromtero 12 ituruka mu Mujyi wa Nyanza ikagenda ikikiza ibishanga ikagera i Gatagara ahari ibikorwa by’ububumbyi biteye imbere ndetse n’ikigo cyita ku bafite ubumuga.
Klaus Eber yavuze ko bamaze iminsi basura izo nzira baziha n’amanota ariko basanze zifite umwihariko ugeranyije n’izo mu bihugu by’i Burayi.
Ati “Abantu benshi bakora ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku kugenda n’amaguru bakunda inzira zirimo ibyerekezo bishushanyije birimo n’amakuru atandukanye. Rero nishimiye kubamenyesha ko izi nzira zo mu Karere ka Nyanza zujuje ibyo byose.”
Yasobanuye ko mu gutanga icyangombwa hari byinshi bishingirwaho birimo ibyerekezo n’ibindi byiza nyaburanga n’ibiranga amateka bikabafasha kugenda bishimye batarambirwa.
Yavuze ko kimwe mu byahesheje amanota menshi inzira zo mu Karere ka Nyanza ari amateka y’Ubwami ahaboneka.
Yasobanuye ko ubusanzwe batanga amanota bakurikije ukuntu ahantu hagenda hahinduka kuko abagira amanota menshi baba bafite byibura ahantu hagera kuri 50 muri izo nzira hatandukanye.
Ati “Ni ukuvuga ngo ukagenda ukava mu ishyamba ukagera mu mirima ihinzemo imyaka, ukagera mu mibaya, mu misozi, mu bisiza, muri kaburimbo, ahatuye abantu, ahadatuwe n’ahandi. Uko guhindagurika kw’ahantu ni ko gutuma inzira zigira amanota meza.”
Yakomeje avuga ko inzira zo mu Karere ka Nyanza bazisuzumye basanga zifite ahantu hagera kuri 75 hatandukanye kandi hari ibyiza byinshi bishimisha abazinyuramo.
Ati “Twe twaje gusanga inzira za hano zifite ahantu 75; ni igipimo kirenze ibindi byose. Ntewe ishema n’uko u Rwanda rugeze kuri icyo gipimo cyo hejuru; mwabonye amanota 75.”
Klaus Eber yavuze ko ku mugabane w’u Burayi aho izo nzira zimaze igihe; izo mu rwego rwa mbere ziba zifite amanota 60 ariko hari iyo mu Budage ifite amanota 80.
Yavuze ko ari igikorwa gikomeye gikwiriye kubyazwa umusaruro kigafasha igihugu mu iterambere.
Asobanura inzego zitandukanye izo nzira ziba zirimo yavuze ko hari urwa mbere rwo hejuru ruba rwitwa ‘Premium’ ari narwo izo mu Karere ka Nyanza bazishyizemo.
Ati “Ubu ku Isi hose cyane cyane mu Burayi hari izigera kuri 600 zo muri urwo rwego rwa premium.”
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ingoro z’Igihugu z’Umurage w’u Rwanda, Amb. Masozera Robert, yavuze ko bishimiye amanota babonye bityo nyuma yo gutangiza izo nzira ku mugaragaro hagiye gukurikira ibikorwa byo kuzimenyekanisha no kuzibyaza umusaruro.
Ati “Izi nzira eshatu zimaze gutangizwa zagiye ku rwego mpuzamahanga; ubu hagiye gukurikiraho kuzimenyekanisha kugira ngo zimenyerwe; abantu bakora mu bukerarugendo batangire bazicuruze bazimenyakanishe.”
Amb. Masozera yavuze ko usibye izo nzira eshatu hari izindi enye zizatangira gukorwa guhera umwaka utaha.
Bamwe mu baturage bitabiriye igikorwa cyo gutaha izo nzira banifatanya n’abayobozi gukora urugendo rwa kilometero 10 mu nzira yitwa ‘Royal Trail’ bavuze ko bazishimiye cyane.
Dusabimana Francine waturutse mu Mujyi wa Kigali ati “Icyanshimishije ni ibintu nabonye bitandukanye birimo utuyira twiza tuzamuka n’utumanuka imisozi; mbese ntabwo umuntu ashobora gucika intege ngo ananirwe. Nabonye Ingoro z’Abami ni ubwa mbere nari mpageze byanshimishije kuhabona.”
Hari bamwe batangiye kubibyaza umusaruro

Bamwe mu baturage batangiye ibikorwa byo kubyaza umusaruro ubwo bukerarugendo bushingiye ku kugenda n’amaguru aho bakora ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi kuri izo nzira.
Umusore witwa Nsanzintwari Augustin wo mu Murenge wa Busasamana yatangiye gucuruza inkoni abantu bashobora kwicumba bazamuka imisozi ndetse n’ingofero zishobora kubakingira izuba.
Ati “Hari ba mukerarugendo bahora baza hano mu Rukari gusura bagakenera inkoni zo kwicumba cyangwa ingofero zo kwambara.”
Minisitiri w’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, Mbabazi Rosemary, yasabye abaturage bo mu Karere ka Nyanza kubyaza umusaruro ubwo bukerarugendo.
Yavuze ko ubukerarugendo ari ikintu u Rwanda rwiyemeje gushyiramo imbaraga ruganisha ku murage n’umuco w’Abanyarwanda.
Ati “Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repubulika yifuza ko Intara y’Amajyepfo iba igicumbi cy’umuco n’umurage wacu. Iyi nzira yose ugakomeza ukagera muri Nyungwe hari byinshi cyane bigize amateka yacu n’umurage wacu dushobora kubyaza umusaruro kandi n’abato bakabimenya bagakura babizi”
Yasabye ubufatanye bw’Akarere ka Nyanza, abari mu bukerarugendo n’abikorera gukora ibikorwa bihabyaza umusaruro mwiza.
Ati “Mumenyekanishe hano hantu ibikorwa bihari baze babisure bahamare umwanya munini bahasige amadevize n’abaturage bacu batere imbere kurushaho.”
Yagiriye inama abaturage yo gucuruza inkoni, ibyo kwitwikira, ibyo umuntu yakwihanaguza icyuya, amazi, imitako n’ibindi bishobora gukenerwa na ba mukerarugendo banyura muri izo nzira.
Yasabye abasanzwe batanga serivise z’amafunguro kwagura ibikorwa no kunoza ibyo bakora ku buryo nta mukerarugendo uzasohoka i Nyanza ngo ajye gushaka icyo kurya cyangwa icyo kunywa ahandi.
Ati “Abanyabugeni, abanyabukorikori n’abatanga serivise mwumve ko ari amahirwe tugomba kubyaza umusaruro.”
Abitabiriye urugendo rwo gutangiza izo nzira ku mugaragaro kuri uyu wa gatatu babarirwa mu bantu 400 barimo n’abanyamahanga.
Icyangombwa inzira z’i Nyanza zahawe kimara imyaka itatu, nyuma yayo nibwo hongera gutangwa ikindi.

Title: Uko byagenze ngo amasezerano y’u Rwanda na PSG agerweho
Body:
Nta wabikekaga urebye uburyo benshi batunguwe. Inkuru yabaye kimomo binyuze ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, nyuma y’umunota umwe yari yamaze gukwira hose.
Nta wabikekaga urebye uburyo benshi batunguwe. Inkuru yabaye kimomo binyuze ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, nyuma y’umunota umwe yari yamaze gukwira hose.
Bamwe babanje gukeka ko ari ’Fake News’, abandi babanza kujijinganya kuko batiyumvishaga ko byashoboka cyangwa se koko ko byari byabaye, muri macye u Rwanda rwongeye gutungurana rusinyana amasezerano y’imikoranire na Paris Saint Germain, ikipe rurangiza muri ruhago yo mu Bufaransa, imwe ikinamo Neymar na Mbappe.
Gutungurana k’u Rwanda ko kumaze kuba akarande kuko rimwe bucya hatangijwe uruganda ruteranya imodoka, ejo ukumva ngo hatangijwe uruteranya izikoreshwa n’amashanyarazi, ubundi ngo hatangijwe urwa telefone, cyangwa se ngo amaraso n’imiti bisigaye bigemurwa ku mavuriro hifashishijwe drones. Buri munsi ucyana ayawo.
Kuri ubu inkuru yamaze kuba kimomo ni uko PSG igiye kujya yamamaza urwa Gasabo binyuze mu gikorwa cyo kureshya ba mukerarugendo kizwi nka ’Visit Rwanda" ku buryo guhera kuri uyu wa Gatatu ku mukino PSG iri buze kwakiraho Nantes, hari butangire ubufatanye bw’u Rwanda n’iyi kipe, aho ’Visit Rwanda’ iza kugaragara bwa mbere ku myenda abakinnyi bari buze kuba bambaye bishyushya.
Kugira ngo ubu bufatanye bugerweho, byanyuze mu nzira ndende ariko itagoye na busa, kubera amakarita yakinwaga. Nta bwana na seti zasakiranaga.
Ni ngombwa ko ubanza ugasobanukirwa ba nyir’iyi PSG n’uko mu myaka itarenze icumi imaze kuba ubukombe mu Burayi. Iyi kipe si iya kera cyane kuko yashinzwe mu 1970 ariko igira amahirwe yo kuba ba nyirayo Guy Crescent, Pierre-Étienne Guyot na Henri Patrelle bari abagwizatunga bakomeye.
Ubuhangange bwayo bwakajije umurego ubwo yagurwaga n’abanyemari bo muri Qatar, Qatar Sports Investments, mu 2011.
Iyi Sosiyete yashinzwe mu 2005 ifite icyicaro gikuru i Doha muri Qatar, ishora imari mu bikorwa by’imyidagaduro na siporo. Perezida wa QSi ni nawe wa PSG, Nasser Ghanim Al-Khelaifi.
Nubwo ari Sosiyete y’ishoramari ikora mu buryo bwigenga, ishingiye kuri leta ya Qatar, bituma iyi kipe ari imwe muri ebyiri zonyine ku Isi zifite ba nyirazo bashingiye kuri leta; yo na Manchester City.
Aba baherwe bayishoyemo imari ifatika, ihera mu gihugu imbere yigarurira ibikombe byose byari bimaze imyaka n’imyaniko bitwarwa na Lyon.
Mu gushaka kwigarurira u Burayi, Al-Khelaifi, yashyize ingufu mu gutuma iyi kipe iba ikirangirire, igura buri mukinnyi wese ukomeye ku Isi ariko w’icyamamare ku buryo byayifunguriye imiryango henshi. Uhereye kuri David Beckham, Zlatan Ibrahimovich, Kylian Mbappé, kugera kuri Neymar Jr uhenze ku Isi kugeza ubu.
Amakuru yizewe agera kuri IGIHE, ni uko kugira ngo ubufatanye bwa PSG n’u Rwanda bubeho mu bijyanye no kuba iyi kipe yakwamamaza ibikorerwa mu Rwanda n’ubukerarugendo bwarwo, byaturutse ndetse byoroshywa n’umubano usanzwe hagati y’u Rwanda na Qatar.
Uyu mubano umaze igihe kinini ni wo watumye Emir wa Qatar, Sheikh Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani, aza mu Rwanda muri Mata uyu mwaka ndetse anasura Pariki y’Akagera ari kumwe na Perezida Kagame mu mvura yagwaga icyo gihe.
Icyo gihe kandi hasinywe amasezerano mu ngeri enye arimo ajyanye n’imikoranire mu rwego rw’umuco, muri siporo, mu bukerarugendo n’ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi ndetse n’ibijyanye n’ingendo zo mu kirere.
Bivugwa ko ibiganiro na PSG byoroshye biturutse kuri uyu mubano ndetse bikomezanya umuvuduko nyuma y’uko uyu muyobozi yari avuye mu Rwanda.
Igikomeye muri byose ni uko nubwo QSi iyoborwa na Al-Khelaifi ari nawe Perezida wa PSG, iyi sosiyete yashinzwe na Emir wa Qatar; byumvikanisha uburyo u Rwanda rwisanze mu biganiro mu buryo bworoshye.
Ikindi ni uko umwe mu bantu batumye QSi igura PSG, ni Nicolas Sarkozy wayoboye u Bufaransa, ubu akaba ari inshuti ikomeye y’u Rwanda ndetse afasha abashoramari bashaka kurugana.
Ubu bufatanye bw’u Rwanda na PSG butandukanye n’ubwo u Rwanda rusanzwe rufitanye na Arsenal, ariko bufite akamaro kanini urebye mu cyerekezo cy’igihugu.
Kuba u Rwanda rushaka kugaragariza amahanga ibyiza byarwo, hamwe mu hantu rwari ruhanze amaso ni ku isoko ry’u Bufaransa, by’umwihariko mu Mujyi wa Paris, ufatwa nk’Umurwa Mukuru w’Isi mu by’umuco.
Ibyamamare hafi ya byose by’Isi bifata Paris nk’Umujyi w’ubukerarugendo, imideli n’ibindi; inkengero za Paris nko mu Mujyi wa Cannes ni ahantu handitse amateka mu bya Sinema. Ibi byose byanatumye mu mikoranire na PSG hitswa cyane ku kugaragaza u Rwanda mu isura yindi y’umuco, hakanatezwa imbere ibikorerwa mu gihugu nk’imideli, icyayi, ikawa n’ibindi.
Ikindi kigaragaza isura yihariye y’iyi mikoranire na PSG ni ishoramari riri gushyirwa mu ngeri zibanzweho muri aya masezerano cyane cyane umuco n’imyidagaduro.
Uru rwego cyane rujyanye n’imyidagaduro n’ubundi Abafaransa bari batangiye kuruyoboka mu Rwanda bigaragazwa n’ishoramari rya miliyoni $40Vivendi ibarizwamo Canal+ yiyemeje gushyira muri Kigali Cultural Village ku musozi wa Rebero.
Gusa igitangaje kandi cyiza muri byose ni uburyo guhera umwaka utaha, icyayi cy’u Rwanda n’ikawa aribyo byonyine bizajya bicuruzwa kuri Parc de Princes, stade ya PSG, biha amahirwe abahinzi n’inganda gutera imbere kurushaho no kubona isoko rishya.
Kuki u Rwanda rwamamaje ku myenda yo mu myitozo n’iyo mu kwishyushya mbere y’umukino?
Amakuru avuga ko u Rwanda rwifuzaga kuba rwagirana amasezerano n’iyi kipe ku buryo Visit Rwanda yamamazwa ku myenda ikipe ikinana, ariko ntibyakunda kubera abandi baterankunga kandi bakomeye PSG ifite.
PSG magingo aya ifite abaterankunga bagera kuri 30. Ab’imena ni babiri aribo Nike iyambika na Sosiyete y’amahoteli ya Accor. Zombi zamamazwa ku mupira imbere aho agaciro k’amasezerano n’izi sosiyete kabarirwa muri miliyoni 165 z’amadolari.
Byonyine amasezerano iyi kipe yagiranye na Accor bivugwa ko ari “mu masezerano ane meza mu Burayi” aho ku mwaka agaciro kayo kagera muri miliyoni 50 z’amadolari.
Arsenal ubusanzwe yamamaza u Rwanda binyuze ku gushyira ijambo Visit Rwanda ku kuboko kw’ibumoso kw’imyenda iyi kipe ikinana muri shampiyona.
Aha hantu ku mwenda wa PSG hafitwe na Banki y’Igihugu muri Qatar (Qatar National Bank) nayo itanga amafaranga menshi, ikanarenzaho guha amasezerano abakinnyi barimo nka Neymar ngo bayamamaze ku giti cyabo.
Iyi banki niyo yahaye PSG inguzanyo y’amafaranga yifashishijwe mu kugura Neymar, aho ayamutanzweho abarirwa muri miliyoni 222 z’amadolari ya Amerika.
Mu mugongo naho hafitwe n’abanya-Qatar, Ooredoo, sosiyete ikora ibijyanye n’itumanaho. Ibi nibyo byatumye u Rwanda rwashakaga kugaragara muri Paris rushaka ubundi buryo hakorwa amasezerano y’imikoranire ndetse hanashyirwamo ingingo nyinshi zirugaragaza mu buryo budasanzwe ndetse ubirebye neza bwihariye kurusha ubwa Arsenal.
Itandukaniro ni uko amasezerano ya Arsenal agaragaza u Rwanda ku rwego rw’Isi yose ariko inyungu yayo ntihite igera ku muturage wo hasi ako kanya, mu gihe aya PSG akora ku buzima bw’umuhinzi wo mu Kitabi uri mu murima w’icyayi.
Umwe mu basesenguye aya masezerano waganiriye na IGIHE yagize ati “Aya Arsenal yagejeje u Rwanda ku rwego ruhambaye bidasanzwe, atandukanye n’aya, gusa icyiza kuri aya ni uko inyungu igera ku muntu ako kanya.”
Ibi bishingirwa ku kuba guhera umwaka utaha w’imikino, ubu bufatanye bw’u Rwanda na PSG, buteganya ko icyayi cy’u Rwanda n’ikawa aribyo byonyine bizajya bitangwa kuri Parc des Princes.
Ushinzwe itangazamakuru n’itumanaho mu Kigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe guteza imbere ibyoherezwa mu mahanga bikomoka ku buhinzi n’ubworozi, NAEB, Pie Ntwari, yabwiye IGIHE ko aha abahinzi indi mpamvu yo kongera umusaruro.
Ati “Iyo tubonye isoko ryiyongera ku yo dufite biba ari byiza. Igishimishije ubu ni uko ari twe twenyine tuzaba twemerewe gucuruzamo [muri stade] icyayi n’ikawa. Twiteze ko amadevize yinjiraga aziyongera. Ikindi abahinzi babonye indi mpamvu yo kongera umusaruro n’ubwiza ku bwinshi. Twiteze isoko ridahungabana mu gihe cy’imyaka itatu.”
Hazabaho kandi icyumweru cy’imishinga y’abanyempano b’abanyarwanda n’Abafaransa. Icyo cyumweru cyiswe “Semaine du Rwanda à Paris” kizajya gitegurwa na PSG mu kumenyekanisha ibintu byose bikorerwa mu Rwanda.
Ibi byiyongera ku mikoranire hagati y’abakora mu ruganda rw’imideli izatangizwa mu mezi ari imbere.
Mu bijyanye no kuzamura impano z’u Rwanda, PSG izagira uruhare mu kuzamura abakiri bato binyuze mu gushinga ishuri ry’umupira w’amaguru i Kigali, aho iyi kipe izajya itegura imyitozo y’abatoza n’abakiri bato mu kubafasha kugira ubunararibonye bw’iyi kipe ikomeye ku mugabane w’u Burayi, by’umwihariko yanditse amateka mu Bufaransa.

— Paris Saint-Germain (@PSG_inside) December 4, 2019

Title: Inzira z’Ubukerarugendo gakondo zitezweho gukuba kabiri umubare w’abasura i Nyanza
Body:
Ubuyobozi bw’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ingoro z’Umurage w’u Rwanda bwatangaje ko inzira z’Ubukerarugendo Gakondo za Kinyarwanda zigiye gutahwa mu Karere ka Nyanza zitezweho kongera umubare w’abagasura bakikuba kabiri ku mwaka.
Ubuyobozi bw’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ingoro z’Umurage w’u Rwanda bwatangaje ko inzira z’Ubukerarugendo Gakondo za Kinyarwanda zigiye gutahwa mu Karere ka Nyanza zitezweho kongera umubare w’abagasura bakikuba kabiri ku mwaka.
Byatangajwe kuri uyu wa Gatandatu mu muganda rusange aho hakozwe ibikorwa by’isuku muri imwe muri izo nzira iherereye mu Murenge wa Busasamana.
Hasobanuwe ko izo nzira ziswe ‘The Nyanza Cultural Trials’ ari eshatu zitandukanye ariko zuzuzanya.
Iya mbere yitwa ‘Royal Trail’ ifite kilometero 10 izenguruka Umujyi wa Nyanza igakikiza Ingoro z’Umurage ebyiri zihari ari zo Ingoro y’Abami mu Rukari n’Ingoro y’Umurage wo kwigira iherereye ku Rwesero ahahoze hatuye Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa.
Iyo nzira kandi izanyura ahari ibindi byiza biranga amateka y’u Rwanda mu Karere ka Nyanza nk’Umusezero w’Abami i Mwima hatabarijwe Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa tariki ya 28 Nyakanga 1959; Umwami Kigeli V watabarijwe ku ya 15 Mutarama 2017 ndetse n’Umwamikazi Gicanda Rosalie wahatabarijwe tariki ya 20 Mata 1995.
Inzira ya kabiri yitwa ‘Big View’ y’ibirometero umunani ituruka mu Mujyi wa Nyanza ikagera ku musozi wa Remera. Iyo uri kuri uwo musozi wa Remera uba ushobora kureba ku ntera y’umurambararo wa kilometero 50.
Ubasha kureba imisozi itandukanye ikikije Nyanza ndetse waterera amaso kure ukaba wabona ibindi bice by’u Rwanda birimo n’ibirunga biri mu Majyaruguru y’igihugu.
Inzira ya gatatu yitwa ‘Gatagara Trail’ y’ibiromtero 12 ituruka mu Mujyi wa Nyanza ikagenda ikikiza ibishanga ikagera i Gatagara ahari ibikorwa by’ububumbyi biteye imbere ndetse n’ikigo cyita ku bafite ubumuga.
Izo nzira zose uko ari eshatu zifite umwihariko w’uko ari utuyira twa Kinyarwanda tunyura mu misozi, ibibaya aho abantu batunyuramo bagenda bareba ahantu hateye indabyo, ahahinze imyaka itandukanye, ahatuwe, urutoki n’ibindi byiza bitandukanye bihaboneka.
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ingoro z’Igihugu z’Umurage w’u Rwanda, Amb. Masozera Robert, yavuze ko izo nzira ziyongera ku bindi byiza biranga amateka mu Karere ka Nyanza bigatuma ba mukerarugendo bahasura biyongera.
Ati “Twazanye ubundi bwoko bw’ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku kugenda n’amaguru baciye muri izi nzira gakondo za Kinyarwanda. Ni ukuvuga ngo abo bantu nibajya baza aho kugira ngo bamare amasaha abiri nibura bazajya bamara iminsi itatu cyangwa barenzeho kandi uko batinda ni ko bituzanira inyungu yo kudusigira amafaranga.”
Amb. Masozera yashimiye abaturage bitabiriye umuganda rusange wo gukora isuku muri izo nzira, abararikira kuzaza kuzitaha ku mugaragaro tariki ya 4 Ukuboza 2019.
Ati “Ni igikorwa gikomeye cyane kizatuma hano i Nyanza cya cyifuzo mwari mufite cy’uko haba igicumbi cy’umuco kiba impamo. Dutekereza ko izo nzira zizatuma abantu basura Nyanza bava ku bihumbi 70 nibura bakagera ku bihumbi 150 ku mwaka.”
Amb. Masozera yasobanuye ko inzobere mu bijyanye n’ubwo bukerarugendo zimaze iminsi zisura izo nzira ari nako zitanga amanota hakaba hari icyizere ko zizaza mu za mbere nziza 1 000 ziri ku Isi.
Muri izo nzira bagiye bashyiraho ibyapa byerekana ibyerekezo ariko abazajya bazinyuramo hari ubwo bazajya bakenera ababasobanurira amateka y’uduce dutandukanye duhari.
Umuyobozi wungirije ushinzwe iterambere ry’ubukungu mu Karere ka Nyanza, Kajyambere Patrick, yasabye abaturage kwirinda kongera kumena imyanda hafi y’izo nzira.
Yabibukije ko bagomba kugira isuku muri byose, buri rugo rukagira aho kujugunya imyanda habugenewe ntibongere kuyishyira aho babonye.
Ati “Nahoze mbona umwanda wari uri hano muri iyi nzira; umuntu arava mu rugo akaza kumena ibishingwe hano cyangwa akagajugunya ibishishwa by’ibitoki kubera ko atumvaga agaciro k’iyi nzira.”
Bamwe mu baturage bo mu Karere ka Nyanza bawiye IGIHE ko nyuma yo kumenya agaciro k’izo nzira bagiye kuzitaho ku buryo hatazongera kugaragara umwanda.
Mukankunzi Jeannette ati “Twishimiye ibikorwa by’ubukerarugendo bikomeje kwiyongera hano iwacu; izo nzira ntabwo zizongera kugaragaramo umwanda kuko buri wese agiye kuba ijisho rya mugenzi we ku buryo nta muntu uzongera kuza kuhamena imyanda.”
Kalisa JMV nawe yavuze ko bishimiye ubusobanuro bahawe ku bijyanye n’izo nzira kandi yumvise bizagirira akamaro Akarere kabo ka Nyanza.
Akarere ka Nyanza kabumbatiye amateka menshi yiganjemo ayo hambere kuko Nyanza yabaye Umurwa Mukuru w’Ubwami kuva mu 1899 kugeza mu mu 1962
I Nyanza hahoze ari Umurwa w’Ubwami kuko hatuwe n’Abami bane ari bo Kigeli IV Rwabugiri wari utuye ku misozi ya Mwima na Mushirarungu; Yuhi IV Musinga watuye i Mwima na Gakenyeri; Mutara III Rudahigwa watuye mu Rukali ndetse n’Umwami Kigeli V Ndahindurwa watuye i Busasamana.
Muri nyanza kandi haboneka Amariba ya Mutende yafukuwe ku ngoma y’Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa, aho Inyambo ze ndetse n’inka z’abaturage ziturutse imihanda yose zashokaga.
Hari kandi Icyuzi cya Nyamagana cyafukujwe n’Umwami Mutara III Rudahigwa afatanyije n’agoronome w’Umubiligi witwaga Dubois.
I Nyanza kandi hafatwa nk’igicumbi cy’ubutabera kuko hahoze urukiko umwami yaciragamo imanza.

Title: Inyubako za mbere mu Rwanda zakira ba mukerarugendo zihenze kurusha izindi (Amafoto)
Body:
U Rwanda rukomeje gutera imbere cyane mu rwego rw’ubukerarugendo, ndetse inyubako zakira ba mukerarugendo zikomeje kuba nyinshi, gusa si ko zose ziri ku rwego rumwe nk’uko amikoro y’abantu agenda asumbana.
U Rwanda rukomeje gutera imbere cyane mu rwego rw’ubukerarugendo, ndetse inyubako zakira ba mukerarugendo zikomeje kuba nyinshi, gusa si ko zose ziri ku rwego rumwe nk’uko amikoro y’abantu agenda asumbana.
Ubwo Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yarangiraga, u Rwanda rwari igihugu cyangiritse, abanyamahanga baragitereranye ndetse nta bikorwa bifatika rufite, kugeza ubwo filime yiswe Hotel Rwanda yajyaga gukinwa, hagafatwa icyemezo ko ikinirwa muri Afurika y’Epfo ku mpamvu zirimo ko mu Rwanda hatari hari hoteli zakwakira ibyamamare nka Don Cheadle uyigaragaramo.
Burya si buno! Ibintu byarahindutse, ubu muri hoteli eshanu z’inyenyeri eshanu zibarirwa mu rwa Gasabo, ebyiri ziri hanze y’Umurwa Mukuru Kigali. Izo ni One & Only Nyungwe House yo muri Pariki y’Igihugu ya Nyungwe na Bisate Eco Lodge yo mu Karere ka Musanze yashyizwe kuri urwo rwego ku wa 1 Ugushyingo 2019.
Kugeza ubu hoteli z’inyenyereri eshanu ziyongera kuri izo ni Radisson Blu Hotel & Convention Centre, Kigali Serena Hotel na Kigali Marriott Hotel.
Ni intambwe zikomeye zizatuma u Rwanda rubasha kugera ku rwego rwo kwinjiza nibura miliyoni 800 z’amadolari ya Amerika mu 2024, ahwanye na miliyari 760 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Twagerageje kwegeranya hoteli za mbere mu Rwanda zihenze, nubwo ibiciro byazo bihindagurika bitewe n’ibihe, ni ukuvuga niba ari mu mezi ajyanye n’ubukeraryugendo cyangwa mu gihe abasura igihugu baba ari bake.
Haniyongeraho ko mu kugena igiciro hitabwa ku gihe umuntu azamara muri hoteli runaka. Ntabwo bivuze ko uburyo zikurikirana hano ari bwo buryo ntakuka. Kugira ngo wumve neza iyi nkuru, birasaba ko wifashisha Calculatrice, hanyuma idolari rimwe riri kuri 925 Frw ugendeye ku ivunjisha rya Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu.
1. Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House
Singita yatashywe ku wa 1 Kanama 2019 na Perezida Paul Kagame aherekejwe na Madamu Jeannette Kagame. Ni inyubako yo ku rwego rwo hejuru yakira ba mukerarugendo nabo bo ku rwego nk’urwo, yubatswe mu Karere ka Musanze ku birenge by’Ikirunga cya Sabyinyo, aho uba unitegeye ibirunga bya Gahinga na Muhabura.
Singita Kwitonda Lodge and Kataza House yubatswe mu gishanga cyari urwuri, ariko ubu hashibutse umushinga ukomeye w’ubukerarugendo ugizwe n’inzu umunani zubatswe mu buryo zirengera ibidukikije.
Zirimo zirindwi zagenewe umuntu umwe cyangwa uherekejwe kuko buri imwe ifite uburiri bumwe, uruganiriro rwagutse n’ibindi byangombwa nkenerwa, hakaba indi imwe yiswe Kataza House yo igizwe n’ibyumba bine byo kuraramo.
Yubatswe n’ibikoresho byinshi byakorewe mu Rwanda, ibyinshi ni ibiboneka i Musanze birimo amakoro n’imigano, itwara miliyoni $25.
Ibiciro byaho byihagazeho nubwo bihindagurika bitewe n’ibihe by’ubukerarugendo nk’uko twabivuze.
Nk’ubu kuva ku wa 1 Ugushyingo kugeza ku wa 19 Ukuboza, icyumba gishobora kuraramo abantu babiri cyishyurwa $1495 ku muntu ku ijoro, mu gihe mu mpeshyi aba ari $1750.
Muri iyi minsi kandi icyumba kibamo ibitanda bibiri kirimo kwishyurwa $4 485, mu gihe ubusanzwe aba ari $5250 hagati y’umuntu umwe na batatu, hakwiyongeraho undi umwe bikajyana n’inyongera ya $1495 mu minsi nk’iyi cyangwa $1750 mu bihe by’ubukerarugendo.
Kurara muri Kataza House yo ishobora kwakira abantu umunani ubu ni $6877 mu gihe ubusanzwe aba ari $8050 ku ijoro rimwe ku bantu hagati y’umwe na bane, hagira uwiyongeraho bikajyana n’izamuka rya $1495 cyangwa $1750 bitewe n’ibihe.
Muri icyo giciro haba hakubiyemo n’ibintu byose umuntu akenera mu ijoro, birimo ibyo kurya no kunywa byose bihaboneka.
2.	One&Only Gorilla’s Nest
Mu kwezi gushize nibwo inkuru yabaye kimomo ko nyuma ya hoteli igezweho imaze igihe muri Pariki y’Igihugu ya Nyungwe, One & Only Resorts yibarutse irindi shami mu karere ka Musanze, ryitezweho kuzajya ryakira ba mukerarugendo basura ingagi.
One&Only Gorilla’s Nest yubatswe mu Kinigi mu ishyamba ry’inturusu, ahantu hitegeye ibyiza by’ibirunga by’u Rwanda. Yubatswe mu biti mo hagati ku buryo buri nzu iteretse ku byuma bishinze, aho nibura bibarwa ko inzu imwe yagiye itwara miliyoni imwe y’amadolari ngo yubakwe.
Kugeza ubu kuharara byihagazeho kuko nka Forest lodge irimo ibitanda bibiri, kuyiraramo ijoro rimwe ari $3,825 ni ukuvuga nibura miliyoni 3.5 Frw; Forest Lodge King ni $3,060 ni ukuvuga asaga miliyoni 2,8 Frw; Virunga Suite ni $4,760 ni ukuvuga miliyoni 4,3 Frw naho Ingagi suite ni $5,900, nibura ni miliyoni 5,4 Frw.
3.	Radisson Blu Hotel
Muri Nyakanga 2016 nibwo Perezida Paul Kagame yafunguye ku mugaragaro inyubako ya Radisson Blu and Kigali Convention Centre, ahamya ko ari intsinzi y’Abanyarwanda kuko bananiwe kenshi kuyuzuza kubera ubushobozi buke, ariko ntibacike intege bikarangira bayujuje.
Iyi nyubako yubatse mu birometero bitanu uvuye ku kibuga cy’indege mpuzamahanga cya Kigali, mu Murenge wa Kimihurura ku buso bungana na hegitari 12,6.
Kigali Convention Centre igizwe na Hotel y’inyenyeri eshanu ifite ibyumba 292, icyumba cy’inama cyakira abantu basaga 2500, ibiro byo gukoreramo n’ibindi. Inyubako zirimo zifite agaciro ka miliyoni 300 z’amadolari abarirwa muri miliyari 223 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Iyo ukigera ku rubuga rwayo wakirizwa ubutumwa ko ushobora kurara muri iyi nyubako itagira uko isa guhera ku $265.50
Ayo madolari agenda azamuka ukagera kuri Junior Suite ifite ibaraza, ikakwemera kugira aho wakirira abashyitsi ugahabwa n’ifunguro rya mu gitondo ku madolari $690.00 kugeza kuri Suite yo iguha ibyo ukeneye byose (Terrace & Lounge Access-Breakfast) yishyurwa $ 3,540.
4.	Kigali Marriott Hotel
Mu 2016 nibwo u Rwanda rwahaye ikaze Marriott Hotel, hoteli y’inyenyeri eshanu igizwe n’ibyumba 254 birimo n’icyo ku rwego rw’abaperezida. Niyo hoteli yayo ya kabiri yari ifunguwe ku mugabane wa Afurika nyuma y’iri mu Misiri.
Kuharara byihagazeho, kuko uwagiyemo nko ku wa Mbere agasohokamo kuri uyu wa Kabiri ku mafaranga make byamusabye kwishyura $210, yakenera kujya mu cyumba cyo ku rwego rwo hejuru akishyura $3,500 kandi ku ijoro rimwe gusa.
Muri rusange iyi hoteli igizwe n’inyubako umunani zigerekeranye, ikagira ibyumba 229 n’icyo twagereranya n’inzu mu yindi cyangwa suite 25, ziri mu rwego rwo hejuru ku buryo umuntu aba yisanzuye, afite ibyangombwa nkenerwa byose imbere ye. Ifite kandi ahantu 14 hatandukanye hashobora kubera inama.
5.	Bisate Lodge
Iyi ni indi nyubako ya Wilderness Safari yubatswe muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Ibirunga.
Bisate ifite ibyumba bitandatu buri kimwe kiri ukwacyo, bishobora kwakira abantu byaba mu buryo bw’umuntu ukeneye kurara wenyine, kurarana n’undi cyangwa guhabwa ibitanda bibiri.
Kuharara umuntu yishyura bitewe n’ibihe ndetse no kuba aherekejwe cyangwa ari wenyine. Nk’urugero uwajya kurara muri Bisate Logde muri aya mezi hagati ya tariki 16 Ukuboza 2019 na tariki 29 Gashyantare 2020, byamusaba kwitwaza US$1654. Gusa ashobora no kugabanuka ku mpamvu zitandukanye.
6.	Kigali Serena Hotel
Kigali Serena Hotel ni imwe muri hotel zigezweho kandi zifite amazina amaze igihe mu Rwanda, ndetse ho ibiciro byayo iyo ufunguye urubuga rwayo ubisoma mu mafaranga y’u Rwanda. Nibura icyumba gihera ku 215 855 Frw ; hakwiyongeramo ifunguro rya mu gitondo bikaba 246 784 Frw. Ni amadolari ya Amerika asaga $230.
Bigenda bizamuka mu biciro bitewe n’imiterere y’icyumba n’ibijyana nacyo, wagera ku byumba byo mu rwego rw hejuru (Junior suite & Suite) ukishyura hagati ya 895 891 Frw na 1.087.018 Frw, ni ukuvuga agera mu madolari ya Amerika $1170.
7.	One and Only Nyungwe House 
One & Only Nyungwe House ni hotel iteye amabengeza yubatswe mu nkengero za Pariki y’Igihugu ya Nyungwe.
Iyi hoteli iri rwagati mu mirima y’icyayi ya Gisakura yongeye gufungurira bose amarembo tariki ya 1 Ukwakira 2018, nyuma yo kuvugururwa no kwagurwa. Yubatswe mu 2010 ku bufatanye na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ihabwa izina rya Nyungwe Forest Lodge, rihinduka mu 2017 nyuma y’uko yeguriwe One & Only Nature Resorts.
Hotel za One & Only Nature Resorts zifite umwihariko wo kuba mu gihe zubakwa, hazirikanwa ku kurengera ibidukikije n’urundi rusobe rw’ibinyabuzima.
Ibyumba byayo uko ari 22 bigaragaza ubwiza bw’imitako igaragaza umuco nyarwanda, bituma uwabirayemo abasha kwisobanurira no kurushaho kwegerana n’u Rwanda atabanje kugira uwo asobanuza.
Serivisi zo ku rwego rwo hejuru One&Only itanga kandi zinihagazeho kuko ibyumba byabo byishyurwa guhera ku madolari 595 mu ijoro rimwe. Hari kandi n’ikindi cyumba cyagutse (Two-Bedroom Forest Suite), gifite uruganiriro n’aho gufatira amafunguro, kandi kiri ahantu uba witegeye ibyiza bitatse ishyamba rya Nyungwe.
Iki cyumba gishobora kwakira abantu bane, kiri mu byumba by’amahoteli bihenze cyane mu Rwanda, kuko cyishyurwa 2 288$.
8.	Amakoro Songa Lodge
Amakoro Songa Lodge ni indi nyubako yiyubashye yakira ba mukerarugendo, iherereye mu Kinigi mu Karere ka Musanze. Ni inyubako ziri ahantu hatuje, ku buryo igihe wasuye ingagi mu birunga cyangwa wagiyeyo kuruhuka, hagufasha gusubiza ubwenge ku gihe ukunga ubumwe n’ibvidukikije.
Kurara muri izi nyubako nabyo byihagazeho, kuko bisaba kwishyura nibura $1200 ku ijoro rimwe, ndetse hari n’aho wishyura $1500 ku ijoro. Ni inyubako y’akataraboneka ibereye buri wese uri mu kwezi kwa buki.
Amakoro Songa Lodge kandi yahawe ubushobozi butuma nk’ababyeyi bafite abana, babona ikibuga gihagije cyo kwidagaduriraho.
9.	The Bishop’s House 
The Bishop’s House ni inyubako itazwi na benshi ariko yihagazeho, yubatswe mu Karere ka Musanze gafatwa nk’irembo ry’ubukeraugendo bwo ku rwego rwo hejuru mu Rwanda, kuko ari iwabo w’Ingagi ziba mu birunga.
Uyirebeye inyuma si inyubako y’igitangaza kuko yubatswe mu buryo bwakoreshwaga mu gihe cy’ubukoloni, ariko itanga serivisi zikomeye ndetse n’ibikorwa biyigize birihariye. Ifite ibyumba icyenda byakira ba mukerarugendo.
Ibyo bituma nk’icyumba cyayo kinini kuruta ibindi (executive suite), kukiraramo bisaba umuntu kwishyura $1200 ku ijoro, Deluxe room ikishyurwa $800 ku ijoro naho ibyumba binini bishobora no kujyamo ibitanda bibiri bikishyurwa $700.
10.	Magashi Camp 
Iyi ni indi nyubako igezweho yubatswe mu Majyaruguru ya Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera, aho uba witegeye ikiyaga cya Rwanyakazinga. Ni hamwe mu hakundwa na ba mukerarugendo banyuranye, baba bajyanwe no gusura inyamaswa ziboneka muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera cyangwa kureba inyoni z’amoko arenga 520.
Magashi yifashishije amahema atandatu, yubatswe n’ikigo Wilderness Safaris itahwa muri Gicurasi 2019.
Ibiciro byayo byihagazeho kuko kuharara ijoro rimwe, nko mu ihema abantu bashobora gusangira, muri aya mezi akunze gukorerwamo ubukerarugendo kuva ku wa 16 Ukuboza 2019 kugeza ku wa 29 Gashyantare, ni amadolari US$650 ku ijoro.
11. Ruzizi Tented Lodge
Ni inyubo igezweho ikoreshwa cyane n’abashaka gukambika muri Pariki y’Igihugu y’Akagera, aho umuntu aba yitegeye neza ikiyaga cya Ihema. Igizwe n’amahema icyenda ateye neza mu biti bituma hahora umuyaga utagira uko usa.
Ishobora kwakira abashyitsi 20 kandi buri hema rikagira ubushobozi bwo gutanga amazi ashyushye n’akonje ku muntu uyakeneye, ikagira umwihariko wo kuba ikoresha ingufu zikomoka ku mirasire y’izuba.
Mu mezi atarimo ubukerarugendo ku rwego rwo hejuru nko kuva ku wa 1 Werurwe kugeza ku wa 30 Gicurasi ndetse no kuva ku wa 1 Ukwakira kugeza ku wa 14 Ugushyingo, umunyamahanga ushaka kuharara, ku ihema rigari abantu bashobora kuraranamo bishyura $195 ku ijoro, umuntu umwe akishyura $265, ihema abana bashobora kuraranamo bakishyura $95 mu gihe ihema ryiyubashye ryishyurwa $280.
Naho mu bihe bibereye ubukerarugendo, umunyamahanga muri Ruzizi yishyura $235 ku ihema ryagutse (Double tent) abantu bashobora kuraranamo, umuntu umwe akishyura $325, aho abana bashobora kurarana bakishyura $115 naho icyumba cyisumbuyeho kikishyurwa $335.
Ibi biciro biragabanuka iyo ari ku banyarwanda cyangwa abanyamahanga bafite ibyemezo byo gutura no gukorera mu Rwanda.

Title: Impamvu u Rwanda rwatoranyijwe kwakira isozwa ry’imurika ry’Ingoro Ndangamurage muri Afurika
Body:
Kuva ku wa 15 Ugushyingo kugera ku wa 31 Ukuboza 2019 mu Ngoro y’Umurage yitiriwe Richard Kandt hari kubera imurika ridahoraho riri mu akomeye muri Afurika rizwi nka Future Africa Visions in Time (FAVT).
Kuva ku wa 15 Ugushyingo kugera ku wa 31 Ukuboza 2019 mu Ngoro y’Umurage yitiriwe Richard Kandt hari kubera imurika ridahoraho riri mu akomeye muri Afurika rizwi nka Future Africa Visions in Time (FAVT).
FAVT ni imurika rizasorezwa mu Rwanda nyuma yo kuzenguruka ibindi bihugu bya Afurika n’ibyo ku yindi migabane bibarizwamo Abanyafurika benshi.
Ryashyizwemo ibihangano bitandukanye by’abahanzi n’abanyabugeni bazwi muri Afurika no mu Rwanda birimo bishushanya urugendo rw’ubumwe n’ubwiyunge no gukira ibikomere nka zimwe mu nsanganyamatsiko zatanzwe ku banyabugeni bashushanyije.
Imurika ryanyuze mu bihugu birimo Kenya, Afurika y’Epfo, Brazil, Zimbabwe, Namibia, Burkina Faso, Cuba, Uganda mbere yo kugera mu Rwanda.
Umuyobozi w’Ingoro y’Umurage yitiriwe Richard Kandt, Rusaro Utamuriza Carine, yavuze ko mu gukusanya ibyamuritswe habajijwe abantu batandukanye barimo abahanzi, abashakashatsi n’abandi icyo batekereza ku hazaza.
Iri murika riri mu Ngoro yo kwa Richard Kandt, ririmo ibihangano by’ubwoko butandukanye, amajwi y’abantu babajijwe yumvikana mu cyumba cyabugenewe ndetse hari n’ahantu ushobora kwicara ukitekerezaho, ukibaza ku hazaza hawe.
Yakomeje ati “Iri murika ridahoraho ni ryiza cyane ku bashyitsi badusura, mu buzima hari ibyo udatekereza ariko aha ufata umwanya ugatekereza ku byo wakora. Rizafasha abantu kumenya umuco w’u Rwanda.”
Ni imurika ryitezweho kongera umubare w’amafaranga yinjizwa n’Ingoro Ndangamurage yitiwe Kandt avuye kuri miliyoni 3-4 Frw ya buri kwezi no kuzamura abasura bakarenga 1500.
Umuyobozi wa Goethe Institute Kigali, Katharina Hey, yavuze ko iri murika rizasorezwa mu Rwanda kuko ari igihugu gihagaze neza.
Ati “Kigali ni icyitegererezo kuri Afurika, iterambere ry’igihugu riha u Rwanda umwanya wihariye utuma rwibandwaho ku Isi yose n’i Burayi. Twatekereje ko hano mu mutima wa Afurika ari ahantu habereye gusorezwa imurika ririmo Abanyafurika.’’
Yakomeje ati “Uburyo iri murika rikorwa byerekana ko abantu bashobora kugaragaza ibitekerezo byabo mu buryo butandukanye bufasha ababireba kugerwaho n’ubutumwa.’’
Mu Rwanda imurika ryahaye umwihariko kwibuka no gukira ibikomere nk’ingingo y’ingenzi ku muryango Nyarwanda.
 Yakomeje ati “Ni uburyo bwo gutekereza ku hahise hagoye urema ahazaza heza. Hari ibindi bihugu twanyuzemo aho twavuze ku bijyanye n’ubukoloni n’ibindi’’
Umunyabugeni Uwase Christa ufite ibihangano bitatu muri iri murika yavuze ko kuba byaratoranyijwe ari ishema kuri we.
Ati “Nibanze ku nsanganyamatsiko ivuga ku kwibuka no gukira ibikomere. Nahisemo gukira kuko ari ikintu tudakunze kuvuga, mu Rwanda hari Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, kuri njye numva ari icya ngombwa cyo kuganirwaho ngo twitegure kutajyana bya bikomere mu gihe kiri imbere.
Uyu munyabugeni ubimazemo imyaka itanu avuga ko kuganira ku byabaye mu Rwanda bituma abantu bakira ibikomere bityo bigafasha ko habaho kwiyubaka no gutera imbere.
Abahanzi bafite ibihangano muri FAVT barimo Mizero Cedric, Chris Schwagga, Crista Uwase, Uwayo Ingrid, Lilian Magodi, Moses Serubibi, John Kamicha, Sam Hopkins, Rui Assubuj, Sylowia Kyambi n’abandi.
FAVT ni imurika ryatangiye mu 2015, mu Rwanda ryateguwe ku bufatanye bw’Ikigo cy’Ingoro z’Igihugu z’Umurage w’u Rwanda (INMR), Goethe Institute na Kaminuza yo mu Budage ya Bayreuth.
